name: Hairtyper
description:
This game was created during Fifty - Fifty Game Jam, orginized by Ten Square Games.

In this game we are one of the fastest hairdressers in the whole city district - a person who is passionate about typewriters. We even imagine making haircuts for customers as typing their wishes on our beloved typewriter. Watch out! Customers tend to change their mind, speak vaguely or take their annoying kids to the saloon... 

Controls:

- SPACE - use booster

- LETTERS ON KEYBOARD - typing

Dzięki Mateusz, za cudne grafiki oraz wspólny game design.
